name: AVTextStyleRule
desc: An object that represents the text styling rules to apply to a media itemâ€™s textual content.

items.name: class func textStyleRules(fromPropertyList: Any) -> [AVTextStyleRule]?
items.desc: Creates an array of text style rule objects from the specified property-list object.

items.name: init?(textMarkupAttributes: [String : Any])
items.desc: Creates a text style rule object with the specified style attributes.

items.name: init?(textMarkupAttributes: [String : Any], textSelector: String?)
items.desc: Creates a text style rule object with the specified style attributes and text range information.

items.name: var textMarkupAttributes: [String : Any]
items.desc: A dictionary of text style attributes to apply to the text.

items.name: var textSelector: String?
items.desc: A string that identifies the text to which the attributes should apply.

items.name: class func propertyList(for: [AVTextStyleRule]) -> Any
items.desc: Converts one or more text style rules into a serializable property list object.
